readDataFromFile(String, char) - Method in class com.nodrex.datamatrix.Matrix
Reads data from file and uses given separator to separate data, it means that all data should be separated only with this separator and nothing else, otherwise NumberFormatException will be thrown.
Matrix will be resized automatically.
readDataFromFile(String) - Method in class com.nodrex.datamatrix.Matrix
Reads data from file and uses one space to separate data, it means that all data should be separated only with one space and nothing else, otherwise NumberFormatException will be thrown.
Matrix will be resized automatically.
